casebody.data:
STATE of Iowa, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Jamodd SALLIS, Defendant-Appellant. No. 17-1842 Court of Appeals of Iowa. Filed January 23, 2019

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

See Iowa R. App. P. 6.904

Jamodd Sallis appeals from his convictions and sentences for possession of a firearm by a felon, being a habitual offender, and carrying weapons. CONVICTION CONDITIONALLY AFFIRMED; RULING ON MOTION VACATED; REMANDED WITH DIRECTIONS.

CONVICTION CONDITIONALLY AFFIRMED. RULING ON MOTION VACATED. REMANDED WITH DIRECTIONS.
